main event: In 1956, a ground-visual UFO sighting was reported in Chicago, Illinois. A bright light was observed moving slowly, then suddenly accelerated and disappeared without leaving a trail or sound.
interesting points: The sighting occurred at 1930, and it involved a single very large, white object that looked like an aircraft.
The object was estimated to be 4228 feet east of the observer and remained in sight for approximately five minutes.
The witness was a 31-year-old housewife in Chicago, Illinois.
No photographs were included in the report.
The conclusion of the report was that the cause of the sighting was unknown.
sighted object: a single very large, white object resembling an aircraft
